resources.string: TEST TEXT. There is little doubt that the international community\'s attitude towards Ukraine has shifted. Full support in Washington DC cannot be guaranteed - and yet the fundamentals of the conflict have not budged. A country on Europe\'s eastern flank is still fighting to repel Russian forces after the Kremlin launched an illegal invasion. Ukraine surprised the world when its armed forces prevented the country being overrun in February 2022. Many Western countries surprised them in return with the enthusiasm of their support. However, Ukraine cannot keep going in the same vein without the wealth and backing of other countries. The first lady\'s warnings seem designed to make that crystal clear.
